name: NEIRUS
description:
Hello and welcome to Neirus!

We recommend that you play this game in full screen. 

This is an interactive story game, so we also recommend that you play it at least twice and make different choices.

A few notes:

  • The EXPLORE button only changes the view and changes the time segment/day forward. There's a chance that you'll find another plant if you EXPLORE.
  • You can fast forward the opening cutscene by holding the escape key. If you’re playing in full screen, use space key to fast forward.
  • Make sure to interact with the plant every time when the time change to check whether the new notes is available or not.
  • Press Q can quit the game. You can refresh the page for another playthrough.
  • There will only be three plants to interact with for this play test.

After you play this game, please help us fill up the survey at here, before Wednesday, May 27, 2020.

Thank you!

Made in Unity with the Fungus extension

More information on Fungus: https://fungusgames.com/

Fungus on the Unity asset store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/fungus-34184
